docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: 🎯 Obiettivi Raggiunti Oggi
docs.text:
• Creata cartella Mkdocs per daily progress desktop/hsg-app-prova-doc
  • Creata Repo su Github e creato Github pages in modo da avere il progress online
  • Setup Ambiente: Create-Vite-App installato/ Tailwindcss configurato/ Installazione Shadcn-ui completata
  • Applicazione: Creata Struttura Cartelle:

docs.title: Struttura App
docs.text: 📁 src/ ├── 📁 components/ │ ├── 📁 layout/ │ │ ├── Navbar.tsx │ │ └── OperatorLayout.tsx │ ├── 📁 sections/ │ │ ├── CardGrid.tsx │ │ └── Hero.tsx │ └── 📁 theme-ui/ │ ├── theme-provider.tsx │ └── theme-toggle.tsx ├── 📁 lib/ │ └── utils.tsx │ ├── 📁 types/ │ ├── app.tsx ├── index.css └── main.tsx

docs.title: Dettaglio della struttura Directory e i componenti creati
📁 components/
docs.text: Contiene tutti i componenti React dell'applicazione - layout/: Componenti strutturali dell'applicazione - Navbar.tsx: Barra di navigazione principale - OperatorLayout.tsx: Layout per la sezione operatore - sections/: Componenti di sezione riutilizzabili - CardGrid.tsx: Griglia di card - Hero.tsx: Sezione hero/header della pagina - theme-ui/: Componenti UI tematizzati - Theme-provider.tsx: Provider React per la gestione globale del tema dell'applicazione - Theme-toggle.tsx: Componente pulsante per alternare tra tema chiaro e scuro

docs.title: 📁 lib/
docs.text: Contiene utility e funzioni helper - utils.tsx: Funzioni di utilità generale

docs.title: 📁 types/
docs.text: Directory per le definizioni dei tipi TypeScript (attualmente vuota)

docs.title: File principali
docs.text:
• app.tsx: Componente root dell'applicazione
  • index.css: Stili CSS globali
  • main.tsx: Punto di ingresso dell'applicazione

docs.title: 💻 Codice Implementato
docs.text:
// App.tsx
import { Navbar } from './components/layout/Navbar'
import { Hero } from './components/sections/Hero'
import { CardGrid } from './components/sections/CardGrid'

function App() {
    return (
        <div className="min-h-screen bg-background">
            <Navbar />
            <main className="container mx-auto py-8">
                <div className="grid gap-4">
                    <Hero />
                    <CardGrid />
                </div>
            </main>
        </div>
    )
}
export default App

// main.tsx
import { StrictMode } from 'react'
import { createRoot } from 'react-dom/client'
import './index.css'
import App from './App'
import { ThemeProvider } from './components/theme/theme-provider.tsx'

createRoot(document.getElementById('root')!).render(
    <StrictMode>
        <ThemeProvider>
            <App />
        </ThemeProvider>
    </StrictMode>
)

// components/Navbar.tsx
import { ThemeToggle } from '../theme/theme-toggle'
import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'
import {
    DropdownMenu,
    DropdownMenuContent,
    DropdownMenuItem,
    DropdownMenuLabel,
    DropdownMenuSeparator,
    DropdownMenuTrigger,
} from '@/components/ui/dropdown-menu'
import { Avatar, AvatarFallback, AvatarImage } from '@/components/ui/avatar'

export function Navbar() {
    return (
        <nav className="border-b">
            <div className="flex h-16 items-center px-4">
                {/* Logo */}
                <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
                    <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-primary">hsg app prove</h2>
                </div>
                {/* Navigation items */}
                <div className="ml-auto flex items-center space-x-8">
                    <Button variant="ghost" size="icon">
                        Dashboard
                    </Button>
                    <Button variant="ghost" size="icon">
                        Projects
                    </Button>
                    <Button variant="ghost" size="icon">
                        Tasks
                    </Button>
                    <ThemeToggle />
                    {/* User menu */}
                    <DropdownMenu>
                        <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>
                            <Button variant="ghost" className="relative h-8 w-8 rounded-full">
                                <Avatar className="h-8 w-8">
                                    <AvatarImage
                                        src="https://github.com/shadcn.png"
                                        alt="@shadcn"
                                    />
                                    <AvatarFallback>SC</AvatarFallback>
                                </Avatar>
                            </Button>
                        </DropdownMenuTrigger>
                        <DropdownMenuContent className="w-56" align="end" forceMount>
                            <DropdownMenuLabel className="font-normal">
                                <div className="flex flex-col space-y-4">
                                    <p className="text-sm font-medium leading-none">shadcn</p>
                                    <p className="text-xs leading-none text-muted-foreground">
                                        m@example.com
                                    </p>
                                </div>
                            </DropdownMenuLabel>
                            <DropdownMenuSeparator />
                            <DropdownMenuItem>Profile</DropdownMenuItem>
                            <DropdownMenuItem>Settings</DropdownMenuItem>
                            <DropdownMenuSeparator />
                            <DropdownMenuItem>Log out</DropdownMenuItem>
                        </DropdownMenuContent>
                    </DropdownMenu>
                </div>
            </div>
        </nav>
    )
}

// layout/CardGrid.tsx
import { Card } from '../ui/Card'

export const CardGrid = () => {
    return (
        <div className="grid gap-4 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3">
            <Card title="Card 1" content="esempio contenuto card 1" />
            <Card title="Card 2" content="esempio contenuto card 2" />
            <Card title="Card 3" content="esempio contenuto card 3" />
        </div>
    )
}

//sections/ Hero.tsx
export const Hero = () => {
    return (
        <div className="p-4 border rounded-lg">
            <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">hsg prova</h1>
            <p className="text-muted-foreground">this is a demo</p>
        </div>
    )
}

// theme/theme-provider.tsx
import React, { useEffect } from 'react'

const ThemeContext = React.createContext({
    theme: 'light',
    setTheme: (theme: string) => {},
})

export function ThemeProvider({ children }: { children: React.ReactNode }) {
    const [theme, setTheme] = React.useState('light')

    useEffect(() => {
        const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme') || 'light'
        setTheme(savedTheme)
        document.documentElement.classList.toggle('dark', savedTheme === 'dark')
    }, [])

    const updateTheme = (newTheme: string) => {
        setTheme(newTheme)
        localStorage.setItem('theme', newTheme)
        document.documentElement.classList.toggle('dark', newTheme === 'dark')
    }
    return (
        <ThemeContext.Provider
            value={{
                theme,
                setTheme: updateTheme,
            }}
        >
            {children}
        </ThemeContext.Provider>
    )
}

export const useTheme = () => React.useContext(ThemeContext)

// theme/theme-toggle.tsx
import { Moon, Sun } from 'lucide-react'
import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'
import {
    DropdownMenu,
    DropdownMenuContent,
    DropdownMenuItem,
    DropdownMenuTrigger,
} from '@/components/ui/dropdown-menu'
import { useTheme } from './theme-provider'

export function ThemeToggle() {
    const { theme, setTheme } = useTheme()
    return (
        <DropdownMenu>
            <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>
                <Button variant="outline" size="icon">
                    <Sun className="h-[1.2 rem] w-[1.2 rem] rotate-0 transition-all dark:rotate-90 dark:scale-0" />
                    <Moon className="absolute h-[1.2rem] w-[1.2 rem] rotate-90 scale-0 transition-all dark:rotate-0 dark:scale-100" />
                    <span className="sr-only">Toggle Theme</span>
                </Button>
            </DropdownMenuTrigger>
            <DropdownMenuContent align="end">
                <DropdownMenuItem onClick={() => setTheme('light')}>Light</DropdownMenuItem>
                <DropdownMenuItem onClick={() => setTheme('dark')}>Dark</DropdownMenuItem>
            </DropdownMenuContent>
        </DropdownMenu>
    )
}
- Cartella UI contiene tutti gli elementi Shadcn-ui importati con npx shadcn@latest add nomeCompoente

docs.title: Come mi Deploy su GitHub Pages?
docs.text: // Aggiunge modifiche - git add . //Commit delle modifiche - git commit -m "update documentazione" // Push al repository principale - git push origin main // Deploya su GitHub Pages - mkdocs gh-deploy

  • Creata Repo su Github "https://github.com/RiccardoFTW/hsg-app-prova", implementata sicurezza Branch

docs.title: 📁 components/
docs.text: • OperatorLayout.tsx: Layout per la sezione operatore

docs.title: 💻 Codice Implementato
docs.text:
// layout/OperatorLayout.tsx
import React from 'react'
import { ChevronLeft, ChevronRight, Home, Calendar, FileText, Bell, Settings } from 'lucide-react'
import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'
import { Separator } from '@/components/ui/separator'

export const OperatorLayout = () => {
    const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = React.useState(true)
    const menuItems = [
        { icon: <Home size={20} />, label: 'Dashboard', path: '/dashboard' },
        { icon: <Calendar size={20} />, label: 'Turni', path: '/shifts' },
        { icon: <FileText size={20} />, label: 'Servizi', path: '/tasks' },

        { icon: <Bell size={20} />, label: 'Notifiche', path: '/notifications' },
        { icon: <Settings size={20} />, label: 'Impostazioni', path: '/settings' },
    ]
    return (
        <div className="min-h-screen bg-background">
            <header className="border-b">
                <div className="h-16 flex items-center px-4">
                    <h1 className="text-xl font-semibold">Dashboard Operatore</h1>
                </div>
            </header>

            <div className="flex h-[calc(100vh-4rem)]">
                <aside
                    className={`
                        border-r
                        transition-all duration-300
                        ${sidebarOpen ? 'w-64' : 'w-16'}
                        `}
                >
                    <nav className="p-2 space-y-2">
                        {menuItems.map((item) => (
                            <Button
                                key={item.path}
                                variant="ghost"
                                className={`w-full justify-start ${
                                    !sidebarOpen && 'justify-center'
                                }`}
                            >
                                {item.icon}
                                {sidebarOpen && <span className="ml-2">{item.label}</span>}
                            </Button>
                        ))}
                    </nav>
                </aside>
                <main className="flex-1 p-4">contenuto principale</main>
            </div>
        </div>
    )
}
- Cartella UI contiene tutti gli elementi Shadcn-ui importati con npx shadcn@latest add nomeCompoente
